General.Name: Excelsior Alimentos S.A
General.Description: Excelsior Alimentos S.A. produces and sells processed meat sausages in Brazil. The company offers protein-based sausages, frozen vegetables, ready-to-eat dishes, mortadella, ham, bologna, and pates. It sells its products through retail chains, distributors, resellers, and small commercial stores. The company was formerly known as Baumhardt Irmãos S.A. and changed its name to Excelsior Alimentos S.A. in 2003. Excelsior Alimentos S.A. was founded in 1891 and is based in Santa Cruz do Sul, Brazil.
General.Address: Barão do Arroio Grande, 192, Santa Cruz do Sul, RS, Brazil, 96830-504
